title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When changing the text in StyledText with word wrap enabled, the redraw operation is inefficient and causes multiple redraws for each visible line.
EB: This issue should be resolved so that there is, at most, one redraw for each visible line during text changes with word wrap enabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, add the following line to the 'performPaint' method in StyledText:

System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
